dct_title_s: Mexico, regia et celebris Hispaniae novae civitas ; Cusco, regni Peru in novo orbe caput
dct_description_sm: Bird's-eye views. Relief shown pictorially. Appears in Braun & Hogenberg's Civitates orbis terrarum, 1572-1618. Mexico -- Cusco. Historic Maps copy 2 uncolored; 2 views separated.
dct_publisher_sm: [Cologne, Germany] : [T. Graminaeus for the authors and P. Galle at Antwerp], [1572?]
